title: "Fintech start-up Clear invests $15 mn to build MaxITC for businesses"
excerpt: "Fintech start-up Clear (from the makers of Cleartax) invested $15 million to build Max ITC for businesses to maximize their savings with ITC claims. MaxITC is an end-to-end automated solution to manage input tax credit claims efficiently."
